root.title: moni fund issu 125 mln dlr eurobond
root.body: moni fund inc issu 125 mln dlr eurobond due april 7 1997 pai 8-1/8 pct price 101 1 2 pct sole lead manag citicorp invest bank ltd sai non callabl bond guarante mutual life insur co u.s. avail denomin 5,000 dlr will list luxembourg sell concess 1-3/8 pct manag underwrit combin pai 5 8 pct payment date april 7
